name: Danielle
description: Lives with wife, Allison, and two cats, Freya and Loki. Enjoys various media, mainly TV shows - Doctor Who, Game of Thrones, Star Trek, and Avatar: TLA.
shoutout: She has the courage to speak up and disagree when everyone else is too overwhelmed to say they have no clue what is happening.

name: Dave B.
description: 24 years old. Went to school in Duluth. Plays guitar and records music. Favorite beer is Stone's All Day IPA. Loves gardening.
shoutout: Thanks to Dave B for his understanding of Bootstrap and his good taste in laying out a page.

name: Brian
description: Has lived in Minneapolis for the last 24 years
Has a son, Elliot, a wife, Christine, and a dog named Rufus
shoutout: Thanks to Brian for taking much better notes than me!

name: Dave H.
shoutout: My table neighbor Dave Hoverson has continued to be a great help with great patience.

name: Amelia
description: Attained a quarter century worth of wisdom while growing up in South MPLS
Spends much of her time staring out the window daydreaming
shoutout: Amelia is a delight to hang out with...thanks for your great cheer, Amelia.

name: Geoffrey
description: Star Wars, Star Trek, Dune, LOTR, Doctor Who, the list goes on...
shoutout: Geoffrey helped me again over the weekend. He has a lot to offer and he is also a really relatable and personable kind of guy...True Epsilon gentleman.

name: Jake
description: Graduated from Metropolitan State University with a degree in Technical Communication
Has two dogs, Tilly and Cooper, and one cat, Bernie
Video games are fun and design is cool as well
shoutout: It was great working with Jonathan, Jake, and Zach for the group project over the past two days. Everyone was really supportive of each other.

name: Manu
description: Loves comics, especially DC (not the state duh), Heavy Metal, and classic rock
shoutout: Manu for sharing his life journey in his speech today. It reminded me of why I decided to come to Prime.

name: John
description: Really doesn't have a middle name
shoutout: It was great to keep working together with Jonathan, Zach, and John.

name: Jonathan
shoutout: Jonathan is the most enthusiastic coder I have ever met. He is so inclusive and made sure evreyone was following his logic. A real gem.

name: Lauren
shoutout: I was so excited to work with Lauren today. She speaks her mind and I can tell that she is methodical and just smart...All around cool person.

name: Laura
description: Student, artist, sister, daughter, and aunt
Soon to be future programmer/dragon rider
shoutout: I'd like to thank Laura for slowing our team down and breaking the Javascript challenge into manageable pieces. This made what seemed like an impossible task, very doable.

name: Liz
description: Dana Carvey follows her on Twitter
Sometimes dresses up like Wayne Campbell
shoutout: I really appreciate Liz's relaxed vibe and positive attitude.

name: Erick
description: Favorite countries/trips are Guatemala, Colombia, France, Argentina, and New York
shoutout: Erick is like a ray of sunshine. He keeps things light and optimistic...He always offers help and stays positive when things get tough.

name: Nick
description: Sometimes forgets to turn the oven off
shoutout: I'm sure he'll get a lot, but shoutout to Nick for being the guy who has the patience to explain a concept beginning to end.

name: Doug
description: Born in NJ, lives in Vadnais Heights
shoutout: Doug is another true gentleman of Epsilon. He is an organizing machine and I love his notes AND his questions...He is patient, kind, and incredibly smart.

name: Ryan
description: Born and raised in the burbs
Rumored to have a life in some circles
shoutout: Ryan for explaining topics to me a little deeper and taking the time to look through my code to find errors.

name: Sarah
description: Has dreams of purchasing a vacant fire station and turning it into a single-family home
shoutout: Sarah, she maintains an admirable stability even when things get crazy.

name: Zach
shoutout: It was great to keep working together with Jonathan, Zach, and John.
